name: Unstable Mights
description:
It is a Beat'em up - Roguelike game in which you first choose the reward you want to get for beating a playthrough. The more powerful the reward, the hardest is the game.

The player is equipped with three mighty powers, that are mighty and powerful but also unstable and may explode causing strange effects

This is a game developed for a Roguelike Jam with the theme "Unstable".

Menus only working with mouse :)

  • Movement: Gamepad Left Stick // AWSD or arrow keys
  • Attack: Gamepad  X // Left button mouse
  • Counter attack: Gamepad Y // E or right button mouse
  • Pick items: Gamepad  X // Left button mouse
